    def __next__(self):
        if self.num_workers == 0:  # same-process loading
            indices = next(self.sample_iter)  # may raise StopIteration
            batch = self.collate_fn([self.dataset[i] for i in indices])   # line 615

                batch = pin_memory_batch(batch)

body:
The error appears to come from `dataloader.py` at this location:
```
    def __next__(self):
        if self.num_workers == 0:  # same-process loading
            indices = next(self.sample_iter)  # may raise StopIteration
            batch = self.collate_fn([self.dataset[i] for i in indices])   # line 615
            if self.pin_memory:
                batch = pin_memory_batch(batch)
            return batch
```
